text:
Christienne Bardecki is a Canadian water polo player.
She was part of the Canadian women's national water polo team at the 2002 Commonwealth Games, 2002 FINA Women's Water Polo World Cup, 2003 World Aquatics Championships, and 2003 Pan American Games.
She played for York University's women's water polo team and University of Hawaii's women's water polo team.

annotations.surface_form: Canadian women's national water polo team
2002 FINA Women's Water Polo World Cup
